availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Micajah C. Howard (Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace)

body.p: Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Virginia native. Married to Mary Howard. Father of Hiram Howard, Clory An Howard, Orlena J. Howard, James L. Howard, Araminta Howard, and John M. Howard. Farmer in Breathitt County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Breathitt County in 1864.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Breathitt County, District 1, p. 96.; Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), Microfilm rolls #994049, Menifee County; KYR-0001-007-0308.
